mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dc (cid, xh, jkd, rl, dy, nz, wd, zfd, ctime, `uid`, zgwd, zdwd, cdcs, xslc ) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jkd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zfd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zgwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xslc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update dc set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xh = #{xh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jkd = #{jkd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rl = #{rl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dy = #{dy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nz = #{nz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wd = #{wd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zfd = #{zfd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zgwd = #{zgwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zdwd = #{zdwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdcs = #{cdcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xslc = #{xslc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cid, xh, jkd, rl, dy, nz, wd, zfd, ctime, `uid`, zgwd, zdwd, cdcs, xslc from dc
